div.pre: 829 Nevrokop (mod. Goce Delƒçev; anc. (739) Nicopolis ad Nestum), Bulgaria, 1931 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 48 AR Alexander III: 9 tetradr.; 7 dr. Athens: 32 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Mouchmov, BIAB 7 (1932-3), p. 423
